title: Hoshiiro Girldrop
description: Daichi Taira and Sosogu Hoshifuri, best friends as young children, promise to marry each other one day. But Daichi moves away and Sosogu’s life goes on, years later becoming a pop idol. Even so, she’s determined to keep that promise.
